title: CarePoint Clinic – Healthcare Management System
description: Role-based Android healthcare application with secure authentication, appointment scheduling, prescription management, lab tracking, and real-time messaging. Integrated a PHP/MySQL backend with a custom TCP server for reliable communication.

title: Cloud Computing Infrastructure on AWS
description: Built a scalable cloud solution using AWS EC2, S3, and RDS with Docker. Implemented auto-scaling and load balancing to ensure high availability and efficient resource utilization.

title: Network File Sharing System (Flask GUI)
description: Developed a client-server file sharing system supporting multiple concurrent clients with reliable data transfer and a user-friendly Flask-based graphical interface.

title: Parallel Programming – CNN Optimization (LeNet-5)
description: Optimized and parallelized the LeNet-5 convolutional neural network using MPI, OpenMP, and CUDA C, achieving up to a 13.58× performance speedup for digit classification.

title: HealthTrack – Personalized Wellness Companion
description: Android health monitoring application offering BMI calculation, calorie tracking, and personalized diet recommendations based on user-input health metrics.

title: Social Media Networking Web Platform
description: Full-stack social media web application with user authentication, post viewing, follow management, and an admin dashboard for managing user profiles.

title: Online Veterinary Appointment System
description: Designed and developed an online veterinary appointment system with public, veterinary, and admin sections. Followed software engineering methodologies and implemented PHP unit testing to ensure reliability.

title: Custom Instruction Set Architecture (ISA)
description: Designed and implemented a custom instruction set architecture, including register design, instruction formats, operation encoding, and datapath development.

title: Database Management System for Civil Defense
description: Developed a complete database system using EER modeling, schema mapping, normalization, and secure SQL queries with stored procedures for data analysis.

title: Diabetes Risk Prediction – Machine Learning Project
description: Machine learning model for diabetes risk prediction using Random Forest (AUC 0.97). Performed data preprocessing, handled class imbalance, and identified key health risk factors such as Polyuria.
